short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Highlight text and search for it in Google Maps.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of navigating to Google Maps in a new tab, typing in a search term, and submitting it to view the result? No more!

This Chrome Extension allows you to highlight text, right-click it, and quickly search for it in Google Maps. It will bring you to a result fast!

It's perfect for when you want to quickly see an address on map.
